name: GreenPush
description: At GreenPush, we believe that real climate action starts from within. We help companies empower their employees with the knowledge, tools and motivation to live and work more sustainably. Whether it's a single engaging talk or a full-scale internal campaign, we work with you to bring your sustainability vision to life.
